snippet: Security forces on Tuesday arrested Gehad el-Haddad, a senior Muslim Brotherhood official who handled the group’s communication with the foreign news media, Egyptian officials said.
abstract: Security forces on Tuesday arrested Gehad el-Haddad, a senior Muslim Brotherhood official who handled the group’s communication with the foreign news media, Egyptian officials said.

byline.original: By DAVID KIRKPATRICK and ROBERT MACKEY

headline.main: Spokesman and Social Media Activist for Muslim Brotherhood Arrested in Cairo

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
